Blog.post: ytd quite late reach hm... so nv write blog... ytd after sch go swimmin wit fulong they all at jurong swimmin complex... the weather is bad... no sun de... veri cold sum more coz its drizzlin... haha... we had alot of fun there... den leave there abt 5 sumthing n went to take bus go jurong point makan... u all noe wat happen?? we took the wrong bus... wasted quite alot of tym... haha... but nvm... stil gt reach jurong point... after eatin... we all went hm... n met francis at CCK first cabin... den after tat we go northpoint walk walk... after tat den they all go hm... den i went to meet her n other frendz... den juz talk talk oni... after tat den i go hm... reach hm liao jiu kena nag by mum... hehe... As 4 2dae... early in the mornin jiu gt socka training liao... end abt 11+ duno y 2dae so unlucky... so mani chances stil canot score... haiz~ after training den went hm wit kama... after reach hm... i go do hse work... guai hor... hehe.. after tat go eat lunch liao jiu face me commy le... hehe... =))

Actually 2dae dun wana go sch de... feel veri tired... but stil wake up... haha... 2dae gt quite alot of free period ar... 1st 2 period of english jiu free liao coz techer nv cum... den sit bhind pretend to do revision but is actually tokin wit frendz abt lame jokes n movies... haha... duno y tok abt movie can tok until those "XXX" movie ar... =X haha... but hor i 2dae quite unlucky ar... keep on losin digimon battles to frendz ='( but in order to win me go find those weaker digimon to fight... clever rite... haha... den laz period our math teacher nv cum n oso no relief teacher... most of us taut of char bo... but we all guai kia ar... oni go off 5 min b4 the bell rings... hehe... den after sch duno where 2 go so folo me frendz go jammin... at the sch gate liao saw the bus cum liao.. den we all lyk siao kia lyk tat run go n chase the bus... lyk desperate 2 sit the bus... haha... managed 2 catch the bus... den reach the music studio jiu start jammin liao... me go there is xtra de... coz me duno hw to play those guitar n drummy... so sit there n c they all jam... but i stil gt sing a song... eh... nt sing... is scream ar... me scream until maximum ar... release stress ar... haha... den after jammin taut of goin bac sch 4 nite study but in the end go sch awhile jiu go hm liao coz nt mani pple stayin bac... so go hm n do hw liao jiu face my commy... hehe... 2dae lyk alot of things to say ar 2 write ar... if i continue sure no space liao ar... ahaha... nite everybody... hehe... =)

2dae juz woke up gt headache liao... haiz... ytd at nite jiu gt le... stil haven ok... nw quite ok liao... haha... 2dae nt so sian as ytd... at least stil gt pay attention to teachers... but... 2nd period oredi cant tahan... den... KNOCKOUT!!! haha... but ltr ss period jiu wake up liao... managed to win sum battle of digimon... haha... this few days DIGIMON MANIA ar!!! haha... keep on playin digimon... recess tym oni read comics n play wit digimon... haha... after recess gt three period D&T oso lyk nv do anithing... do sum of my MT work den after tat read chinese comics... haha... 2dae qutie addicted to comics ar... hehe... after sch... went to find to the gal nxt door... haha... den she say she goin study wit frendz... den i jiu go hm wit kama they all... battle wit kelvin on the way hm.. draw sia... he win me 2 tym i oso win him 2 tym...haha... taut of goin bac sch study but feel veri sian.. so nv go bac... at hm face the com. den ltr at nite den study... duno y i feel jealous when gt other guy make bread 4 her 2 makan... haiz... think too much ar... haha... actually me gt sumthing wana ask her... but dun dare ask...=p tats all me wana write 4 2dae... tml or otherdays den add sum more... bye!!! ole!!! whahaha!!!

Hi everyone!!! welcome to view my blog... hehe... this blog i juz made todae coz i c my frendz have den i oso wan 2 hav... haha... eh... 2dae nth much to write ar... quite a sian day... oni 2dae assembly programme quite interesting ar... so slag this few days... nv study... haiz... oni play digimon n battling wit frendz... but lose ='( haha... n oso spent time thinkin of her... miss her so much sia...=p this few days oso nv play socka liao... everyone lyk no mood to play... after sch oni go hm n oni face the com. hehe... tats all me wana write... if gt anithing else ltr or tml den add in... hehe... ole!!!
